alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 3:42AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN DELAWARE AND NORTHERN LICKING COUNTIES THROUGH 415 AM EDT... At 341 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located from near Danville to near Centerburg to near Ashley, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Heath, Granville, Utica, Ashley, Hanover, Marne, Hartford, St. Louisville, Toboso, Fredonia, US Route 62 at State Route 661, Olive Green, Purity and Fallsburg. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 136 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
